text: Ship in Distress () is a 1929 German silent drama film directed by Carmine Gallone and starring Liane Haid, Alfons Fryland, and Gina Manès. The film's sets were designed by Heinz Fenchel and Jacek Rotmil. It was distributed by the German branch of First National Pictures. ==Cast== ==References== ==Bibliography== * ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:German films Category:Films of the Weimar Republic Category:German silent feature films Category:Films directed by Carmine Gallone Category:Seafaring films Category:German black-and-white films Category:German drama films Category:1929 drama films
title: Ship in Distress (1929 film)
